definition: increasing (or tending to increase) blood pressure, any agent that causes a narrowing of an opening of a blood vessel: cold or stress or nicotine or epinephrine or norepinephrine or angiotensin or vasopressin or certain drugs
details:
adjective
- increasing (or tending to increase) blood pressure
= example: increasing (or tending to increase) blood pressure
noun
- any agent that causes a narrowing of an opening of a blood vessel: cold or stress or nicotine or epinephrine or norepinephrine or angiotensin or vasopressin or certain drugs
= synonyms: vasoconstrictor, vasoconstrictive
